desc: Applies the new stuff added to home manager
Build system, apply changes, and auto-sync all configuration files to GitHub.
Push my new commands to GitHub and trigger the Vercel deploy for my directory website.
Quickly view the local cheatsheet of all saved commands in the terminal.
Reloads the Zsh shell to apply new configurations and activate new aliases/functions.
Reveals the files and the folders inside the current directory and what's inside them
Resumes a conversation from where left off
Any time you put this in a prompt in claude code it forces it to think extra hard for the problem
Staches the current prompt such that if needed you can do something else before running that commands
